sentences.en: Disengage the blower motor wire harness from the wire harness retainer.
sentences.cn: 把吹风机马达线束从连线线束夹扣中脱离出来.

sentences.en: Every Offshore company must have appoint our firm as Retainer.
sentences.cn: 所有离岸公司必须委任本行提供企业秘书合规及咨询服务.

sentences.en: Headhunters are compensated on either a contingency or a retainer basis.
sentences.cn: 猎头公司以获取酬金或劳务费的方式来补偿自己的付出.

sentences.en: Her arrival had just been announced by the faithful retainer.
sentences.cn: 她的忠仆刚宣布了她的到来.

sentences.en: Kit includes: Seat, Retainer Wire and Cover O ring.

sentences.en: Liz was being paid a regular monthly retainer.
sentences.cn: 利兹每月得到一笔预付金。

sentences.en: NPI is paid a retainer, with some incentive - based fees as a bonus.
sentences.cn: 新产品引进,是付出了聘约, 与一些以奖励为基础的费用作为奖金.

sentences.en: The agency will pay you a monthly retainer.
sentences.cn: 这个机构将会每月付给你聘用金。

sentences.en: The upper stem is threaded into the diaphragm retainer nut.

sentences.en: Titanium Alloy Valve Retainer could help in reducing noise, friction, and vibration.

sentences.en: We pay him a retainer of $ 1, 000 per annum.
sentences.cn: 我们每年付给他1, 000美元的预聘费.

sentences.en: You or the multi million dollar industry that pays his retainer?
sentences.cn: 是你,还是那个每年可以给他的侍从支付几百万美元的人?

words.tran_cn: [机]保持器；家臣；保持者；护圈；预付费用

trans.tran_cn: [机]承盘，挡板，家臣，侍从，[牙科]牙架，保持着
trans.tran_en: a reduced amount of rent that you pay for a room, flat etc when you are not there, so that it will still be available when you return
